comment.author: 26929126@N00
comment._content: Pat Maloney played one season (1912) for the New York Highlanders. www.baseball-almanac.com/players/player.php?p=malonpa01

comment.author: 37025891@N02
comment._content:
Patrick Maloney was my grandfather..... I did not grow up around him,
and I was in high school when I found out that he had played pro baseball.....  When I enlisted in the US Air Force in 1967, my grandfather (Pat Maloney) told me that wounds he received; plusbeing gassed by the Germans in WW1, ended all hope of ever playing major league baseball again......
